categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Battle of Saloch was a battle of the Reslian Purge that took place on Saloch² in 7 BBY.
The Imperial Navy and particularly the sixth starfighter squadron of the 37th Imperial Fighter Wing saved the Tunroth from extermination and defeated the Lortan fanatics.
This battle was the first battle of Soontir Fel.
